product.longDescription: A 76.77% copper hydroxide-based, broad-spectrum fungicide for disease control, including Late Blight. Use at first sign of disease and repeat, or most effectively as a preventative measure when known outbreaks are in your area. Water-dispersible granules. Alternate use with OxiDate® helps prevent development of tolerant strains of bacteria and fungi. Typical usage is 1-4 lb./acre depending on crop. Shelf life is very long (essentially indefinite) if kept in a cool, dry location.
product.shortDescription: OMRI listed. Superior disease control provides for a more marketable crop at harvest.

attributes.label: Grid Description
value: A "must-have" copper for your disease prevention rotation schedule.

Nu-Cop® 50DF Fungicide – 20 Lb.

Product ID:9778.09778

A 76.77% copper hydroxide-based, broad-spectrum fungicide for disease control, including Late Blight. Use at first sign of disease and repeat, or most effectively as a preventative measure when known outbreaks are in your area. Water-dispersible granules. Alternate use with OxiDate® helps prevent development of tolerant strains of bacteria and fungi. Typical usage is 1-4 lb./acre depending on crop. Shelf life is very long (essentially indefinite) if kept in a cool, dry location.
